thread.title: It takes one to know one?
thread.title_full: It takes one to know one?

title: It takes one to know one?
text: [news] 14:34 Telegraph 4 hours ago: Nigel Voden, drugs expert, is arrested on suspicion of supplying crack cocaine. Attached to the Home Office as an advisor. Makes you wonder - if he had applied for a classroom assistant post he would have been found out immediately. Doesn't bear thinking about how lax the hirers and firers are. Should The Right Honourable lady T. May resign?
